passives.name: The Path Between
passives.effects:
If you have at least 130 bonus attack damage and 180 ability power, enter either the Material World or the Spirit World, determined randomly, at the start of the combat phase in each round:

• Material World: Increase your attack damage by 20% and gain 50% – 150% (based on %) bonus attack speed.
• Spirit World: Increase your ability power by 20% and gain 30 – 120 (based on level) ability haste.
